subSections.title: Pronunciation 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=bó,báo,bò,1nb=standard in Mainland and Taiwan,2nb=standard in Mainland,2nc=variant in Taiwan,3nb=standard in Mainland and Taiwan,2a=y
|m_note=bó - literary (“weak, poor, stingy”); báo - vernacular (“thin”); bò - only used in {{zh-l|*薄荷}}
|m-s=
|c=bok6,bik1
|c_note=bik1 - common (but possibly erroneous) pronunciation for “to approach”
|c-t=
|g=
|h=pfs=pho̍k;gd=pog6
|j=
|mb=bò̤
|md=bŏk
|mn=po̍h/po̍k
|mn_note = po̍h - vernacular, surname; po̍k - literary
|mn-t=boh8/bêg4/bo7
|mn-t_note=bêg4 - “to approach”; bo7 - only used in {{zh-l|*薄荷}}
|w=5boq,3bu
|x=
|mc=y
|oc=y
|ma=
|cat=a,pn
}}

subSections.title: Compounds
